Research & Publications

2024

Effect of Fatty Acid Profiles in Ready-to-Use Therapeutic Foods

Nienaber A, Conradie C, Manda G, et al. Nutrition Reviews, 82(12), 1784-1799.

Systematic review assessing the impact of varying fatty acid profiles in therapeutic foods on neurodevelopmental and clinical outcomes of severely wasted children.

View Publication →
2024

Energy Provided and Growth During Severe Wasting Treatment

Potani I, Tausanovitch Z, Ritz C, Briend A, Manda G, et al. Maternal and Child Nutrition, 20(4), e13693.

Secondary data analysis from Mali demonstrating positive relationship between energy provided at admission and catch-up growth in children with MUAC < 115 mm.

View Publication →
2023

Outcomes of Wilms Tumor Therapy in Lilongwe, Malawi

Holmes DM, Matatiyo A, Mpasa A, Manda G, et al. Pediatric Blood and Cancer, 70(5), e30242. Cited by 14.

Retrospective cohort study assessing outcomes of resource-adapted treatment protocol for Wilms tumor in Malawi, 2016-2021.

View Publication →
2022

The Burden of Malnutrition in Childhood Cancer in Malawi

Huibers MHW, Manda G, Silverstein A, et al. Nutrition and Cancer, 74(9), 3322-3328. Cited by 13.

Single-center retrospective cohort characterizing age-related malnutrition burden among 463 children with cancer.

View Publication →
2022

Palliative Care Services in Pediatric Hematology-Oncology

Silverstein A, Butia M, Bank R, Manda G, et al. Journal of Pain and Symptom Management, 63(5), e473-e480.

Three-year retrospective review describing establishment of palliative care program within pediatric hematology-oncology program in Lilongwe, Malawi.

View Publication →
2021

Pediatric Lymphoma Health-Related Quality of Life in Malawi

Ellis GK, Chapman H, Manda A, Manda G, et al. Pediatric Blood and Cancer, 68(10), e29257. Cited by 13.

Patient-reported outcomes study using Chichewa PROMIS-25 among pediatric lymphoma patients.

View Publication →
2018

Pyoderma Gangrenosum Associated with Crohn's Disease

Manda G, Finch P, Mponda K. Tropical Doctor, 48(1), 43-46.

Case report and literature review of pyoderma gangrenosum in Malawian teenage boy with Crohn's disease.

View Publication →
2016

Household Air Pollution and Acute Lower Respiratory Infections in Adults

Jary H, Simpson H, Havens D, Manda G, et al. PLOS ONE, 11(12), e0167656.

Systematic review examining association between household air pollution from solid fuel burning and acute lower respiratory infections in adults.

View Publication →
2014

Cancer Survival in Malawi: A Retrospective Cohort Study

Msyamboza KP, Manda G, Tembo B, et al. Pan African Medical Journal, 19, 234.

Analysis of 842 cancer patients demonstrating poor survival with median survival time of 9 months and only 6% surviving ≥5 years.
